meanings.definition: To give as a reward or recognition for merit.
meanings.sent1: She was awarded a gold star for her hard work in class.
meanings.sent2: The winner of the competition was awarded a shiny trophy.
meanings.sent3: The cat was awarded a special treat for catching a mouse.
meanings.sent4: The sun awarded the flowers with its warm rays, making them bloom beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The teacher awarded the student with a certificate for perfect attendance.

meanings.definition: To grant as a result of a decision or judgment.
meanings.sent1: The judge awarded custody of the child to the mother.
meanings.sent2: The committee awarded the contract to the most qualified bidder.
meanings.sent3: The magic wand awarded the brave knight with invincibility.
meanings.sent4: The universe awarded him with unexpected opportunities, changing his life.
meanings.sent5: The lottery machine awarded the lucky ticket holder with a huge cash prize.
